title: Another Outstanding Performance - 7846 Art
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

+ [[[SCP-7846|Hooked to the show...]]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:another-outstanding-performance-7846/IMG_0376.png]]


> A little thing I drew as part of an [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-16702779/art-requests Art Request thread] I'm doing! <3 
> Thank you to [[*user Cathy Autumn]] for requesting this! I truly adore the extensive references here to media I'm quite fond of (Michael did nothing wrong and is perfectly innocent and justified in all his crimes <3), and I hope I did my adoration justice with this! 
> And as always - if you like this, my author page is [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost Here]

[[/=]]
author: Dr Vikki Lost
